info.title: Colorimage API
info.description: Official documentation of the Colorimage API.

get.summary: Log the user's connection to the database.
get.description: Logs the user's connection to the database.

201.description: Created. User's connection was logged successfully.

401.description: Unauthorized, the provided token does not match any tokens in our database.

get.summary: Log the user's disconnection to the database.

200.description: Success. User's disconnection was successfully logged into the database.

401.description: Unauthorized. Invalid token provided with authorization header.

post.summary: Registers the user using the provided information
post.description: Registers the user using the provided information, if the email or username are not in use.

requestBody.description: Requires the email and the password of the user.

400.description: Bad request. Invalid or missing information.

example.message: Invalid format of email or password

406.description: Not acceptable. Username or email are already taken.

example.message: User is already authentified. To logout, use /auth/logout

409.description: Conflict. Username or email already in use.

example.message: Username or email already in use

500.description: Unexpected internal server error. This could be due to a problem during JWT token generation.

get.summary: Fetch all information of the user with the given id

200.description: Success. Returns a JSON with the user's complete information.

204.description: No Content. Request was successful, but no content was found.

example.message: Request was successful, but no content was found.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing identifier format.

401.description: Unauthorized. The provided authentication token does not meet the necessary criterias to complete the request.

get.summary: Fetch all channels of a given user.

200.description: Success. Returns an array with all of the user's channels.

204.description: No Content. Request was successful, but no content was found.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing identifier format.

401.description: Unauthorized. The provided authentication token does not meet the necessary criterias to complete the request.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the user for whom to fetch the logs.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Amount of records to skip. Use this for pagination. Defauls to 0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Amount of records to take. Use this for pagination. Defaults to 50.

get.summary: Fetch all logs for a given user.

200.description: Success. Returns an array with all of the user's logs.

204.description: No Content. Request was successful, but no content was found.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing identifier format.

401.description: Unauthorized. The provided authentication token does not meet the necessary criterias to complete the request.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The amount of indexes to skip. Default: 0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum length of the returned array. Default: 50

200.description: Success. Returns an array of all public users information.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid format of offset and/or limit.

example.message: Invalid format of offset and/or limit.

get.summary: Fetch public profile of a specific user

200.description: Success. Returns a JSON with the user's public information.

204.description: No Content. Request was successful, but no content was found.

example.message: Request was successful, but no content was found.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing identifier format.

200.description: Success. Returns a list of channels

204.description: No Content. Request was successful, but no content was found.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing identifier format.

401.description: Unauthorized. The provided authentication token does not meet the necessary criterias to complete the request.

200.description: Success. Returns a list of channels

example.message: Success! Channel Demo was created successfully.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing identifier format.

401.description: Unauthorized. The provided authentication token does not meet the necessary criterias to complete the request.

get.summary: Fetch all relevant information pertaining to that channel. The request must be from a user that has access to the channel.

200.description: Success. Returns a JSON containing all of the messages by all of the members of the channels.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing identifier format.

401.description: Unauthorized. The provided authentication token does not meet the necessary criterias to complete the request.

get.summary: Fetch all messages in a channel

200.description: Success. Returns an array of all the messages.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing identifier format.

401.description: Unauthorized. The provided authentication token does not meet the necessary criterias to complete the request.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Amount of records to skip. Use this for pagination. Defauls to 0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Amount of records to take. Use this for pagination. Defaults to 50.

200.description: Success. Returns an array of all the drawings/collaborations.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or missing query parameter format.

401.description: Unauthorized. The provided authentication token does not meet the necessary criterias to complete the request.

password.description: Password must be at least 8 characters, have at least one digit, at least one UPPERCASE character, at least one lowercase character, at least one special character.

username.description: The username of the registering user. The username must be unique

first_name.description: The first name of the registering user.

last_name.description: The last name of the registering user.

avatar_url.description: URL pointing to the location of the avatar of the user.

user_id.description: User id of the requesting user

avatar_url.description: URL pointing to the location of the avatar of the user.

collaboration_count.description: Number of collaborations the user has been a part of.

active_team_count.description: Total team count of the user.

average_collaboration_time.description: Average drawing collaboration time of the user.

total_collaboration_time.description: Total drawing collaboration time of the user.

type.description:
Type of the log.

Possible values:

- Connection

- Disconnection

- DrawingUpdate

drawing_id.description: [OPTIONAL] If the log type is 'DrawingUpdate', then a drawing id will be present, this can be used to redirect the user to the updated drawing.

avatar_url.description: URL pointing to the location of the avatar of the user.

index.description: Index of the user's profile in the list of profiles. This is used for identification and cursor pagination.

type.description:
Type of the channel.

Possible values:

- Public

- Private

collaboration_id.description: ID of the collaboration the channel belongs to. This value could be null.

created_at.description: ISO Date string of the time the message was created.

avatar_url.description: URL pointing to the location of the avatar of the user.

timestamp.description: Timestamp in HH:mm:ss format of the time the message was created.

drawing_id.description: Use this id to redirect to the drawing if the type is DrawingUpdate
